Methods in com.ning.billing.payment.plugin.api that throw PaymentPluginApiException
 void PaymentPluginApi.addPaymentMethod(UUID kbAccountId, UUID kbPaymentMethodId, PaymentMethodPlugin paymentMethodProps, boolean setDefault, CallContext context)
          Add a payment method for a Killbill account in the gateway.
 void PaymentPluginApi.deletePaymentMethod(UUID kbPaymentMethodId, CallContext context)
          Delete a payment method in the gateway.
 PaymentInfoPlugin PaymentPluginApi.getPaymentInfo(UUID kbPaymentId, TenantContext context)
          Retrieve information about a given payment.
 PaymentMethodPlugin PaymentPluginApi.getPaymentMethodDetail(UUID kbAccountId, UUID kbPaymentMethodId, TenantContext context)
          Get payment method details for a given payment method.
 List<PaymentMethodInfoPlugin> PaymentPluginApi.getPaymentMethods(UUID kbAccountId, boolean refreshFromGateway, CallContext context)
          This is used to see the view of paymentMethods kept by the plugin or the view of existing payment method on the gateway.
 PaymentInfoPlugin PaymentPluginApi.processPayment(UUID kbPaymentId, UUID kbPaymentMethodId, BigDecimal amount, CallContext context)
          Charge a specific amount in the Gateway.
 RefundInfoPlugin PaymentPluginApi.processRefund(UUID kbPaymentId, BigDecimal refundAmount, CallContext context)
          Process a refund against a given payment.
 void PaymentPluginApi.resetPaymentMethods(List<PaymentMethodInfoPlugin> paymentMethods)
          This is used after Killbill decided to refresh its state from the gateway
 void PaymentPluginApi.setDefaultPaymentMethod(UUID kbPaymentMethodId, CallContext context)
          Set a payment method as default in the gateway.
